name: Sentret

evolution.description: Sentret can evolve into Furret at level 5 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 10 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Scout Pokémon. When Sentret sleeps, it does so while another stands guard. The sentry wakes the others at the first sign of danger. When this Pokémon becomes separated from its pack, it becomes incapable of sleep due to fear.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be the target of an attack of opportunity.

abilities.name: Keen Eye
abilities.description: This Pokémon ignores disadvantage when it relates to sight.

abilities.name: Frisk
abilities.description: Upon entering a battle, a single opponent’s held item is revealed, if it has one.
